sections.MISSION: K TRP, 3/2CR conducts M17 qualification range for all Soldiers at Range 202 on 09 JUNE 2023. This range will give Troopers a opportunity to qualify on their M17 weapon systems with a score of 21/30 and prepare them for future collective training.
sections.END STATE:
All Soldiers are qualified on their M17 weapon system to prepare for the integration of direct fires into future Live Fire Exercises and collective training exercises. Training Objectives:
Qualify Shooters with score of 21/30.
Task Organization:
OIC: 1LT Wuerthner RSO: SSG Garcia
NCOIC: SFC Pelletier Medical: SPC Kelly Primary Safeties: SGT Cravens, SGT Voss, SGT Mendoza,, SGT Mouling, SGT Zinke, SGT Torres, SGT Cornett, SPC (P) Holsinger, SPC (P) Boulanger. Ammo Handlers: SGT Lomeli, SGT Anderson, Additional range support provided by 3/ Kronos.
3 PAX Gate Guard 2 PAX Score Keeper 1 PAX RTO 3 PAX Ammo Point
Timeline:
0600- Range Detail SP to Range 202. 0700- Ammo Drop off
0715- All trainees arrive on range
0745- Safety Brief
0800- First Round Down Range 1800- Range Cold Status / Police Call 1930- Ammo Pick Up. 2000- All PAX RTB
Ammo Allocation:
5k Rounds for 120 Pax
30 Pax per Troop, 1,250 Rounds per Troop
RG 101/102
ZERO
QUAL
